q1: Who do you think Barcelona should sign this summer?
a1: how long do the games usually last?
q2: Games are 90 minutes with a 15-minute halftime.
a2: Hi! I think Barcelona should sign another central midfielder that is more technical than Paulinho.

a3: yeah I sort-of think are pretty dependent upon Messi. Though do have other decent players but Messi is the talk of the town so to say.
